sentence.text: Genetic variation in the neutrophil degranulation/regulation of cell growth region has been linked to beta-type HPV infection and squamous cell carcinoma of the skin, cervical cancer, HPV persistence and progression to cervical cancer.

entity.text: squamous cell carcinoma of the skin

sentence.text: Here, we have tested the hypothesis that the common regulation of cell growth SNP rs7208422 is associated with high-risk HPV infection and risk of head and neck squamous cell carcinoma (HNSCC).
